name: Maxthon Skin File
summary: Learn about .MXSKIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When you download a new skin, you can double click it to import it into Maxthon. Then, you can change the Web browser's skin by selecting Menu → Skins from the application menu and choosing a skin from the list.
MXSKIN files are stored in the [user]\​AppData\​Roaming\​Maxthon3\​Skins\​ directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
